aboutUs.summary1: This project has been developed as part of the Multimedia Technology course in the Computer Engineering degree. The goal is to apply the knowledge taught in the course to a real and functional web application. In this web app, users can search for hotels, filter results, view detailed information, and write and read comments from other users.
aboutUs.summary2: Best practices for web app design have been applied, and the application has been developed using Bootstrap and ReactJS.
aboutUs.cardText: Final-year Computer Science student. Responsible for interface development using React, Bootstrap, and JavaScript.
